svt_gpio_driver_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_gpio_driver_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Additional protocol-specific callbacks

  function void
 svt_gpio_driver_callback::new

CONSTUCTOR: Create a new callback instance
 Superseded functions 
 uvm_object :: new 
 uvm_callback :: new 

 virtual function void
 svt_gpio_driver_callback::observed_out_cov
 (  svt_gpio_driver driver , svt_gpio_transaction xact  ) 

Coverage callback method called after a transaction has completed or interrupt condition detected.

driver - A reference to the svt_gpio_driver component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the descriptor for the completed transaction or interrupt. The transaction must not be modified.

 virtual task
 svt_gpio_driver_callback::post_input_in_get
 (  svt_gpio_driver driver , svt_gpio_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Called after the traaction has been received from the sequencer, before its execution begins.

driver - A reference to the svt_gpio_driver component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the descriptor for the transaction that is about to start. Modifying the transaction descriptor will modify the transaction that will be executed.

drop - If set, the transaction will not be executed.

 virtual function void
 svt_gpio_driver_callback::pre_observed_out_put
 (  svt_gpio_driver driver , svt_gpio_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued by the component after completing a transaction or detecting an interrupt condition, just prior to placing the transaction in the analysis port.

driver - A reference to the component object issuing this callback.

xact - A reference to the complete svt_gpio_transaction descriptor or interrupt The transaction must not be modified.
